description: Ensure XAML controls declare AutomationProperties.Name so assistive tech announces their purpose.
recommendation: Set AutomationProperties.Name or bind a descriptive accessible name on interactive controls and custom components. (WCAG 2.1 SC 4.1.2)
algorithm: Flags XAML Image/Button/TextBox elements missing AutomationProperties.Name or AutomationProperties.HelpText.
algorithm_advanced: Matches XAML Image/Button/TextBox elements and reports missing AutomationProperties.Name/HelpText attributes.
